hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying When a woman gives something her husband has earned without being commanded by him to do so, she has half his reward

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَرْأَةِ تَتَصَدَّقُ مِنْ بَيْتِ زَوْجِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Sadaqah Given By A Woman From Her Husband's Property
